## Checklist

Make sure to run `make check` and `make fix` before creating a PR, otherwise the CI will fail.

- [ ] tested with Python3.9
- [ ] signed commits
- [ ] updated documentation (e.g. parameter description, inline doc, docs.nitrokey)
- [ ] added labels
